description: This file contains implementation of advanced operational functions for a ping utility object in a broadband management environment. It defines the function BbhmDiagResolvAddr which is responsible for resolving network addresses before sending packets.

classes.name: PBBHM_DIAG_IP_PING_OBJECT
classes.description: Structure representing the ping object, including properties and sink object reference.

classes.name: PBBHM_IP_PING_PROPERTY
classes.description: Structure holding configuration properties for the ping operation.

classes.name: PBBHM_IP_PING_SINK_OBJECT
classes.description: Object managing socket operations for the ping object, providing socket resolution functionality.

classes.name: PANSC_XSOCKET_OBJECT
classes.description: Interface representing socket object capable of resolving address.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BbhmDiagResolvAddr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Resolves the target address for the ping operation by invoking the socket's resolve function.
